The TV station: s report used footage from January 2019, not from the time when the fine for violating social distancing rules was implemented in April 2020.
The image showing Gov: Gretchen Whitmer signing the order with a group of people behind her was misleadingly juxtaposed with the headline about fines for ignoring social distancing.
The report: s misleading use of the footage and headline has fueled false claims of hypocrisy on social media.
Gov: Gretchen Whitmer clarified that the photo was being misused and called for correction of the mistake.
